De son côté, Kiev nie toute implication directe dans cet événement, qui représente l'attaque de drone la plus massive envers Moscou depuis le début du conflit en Ukraine en février 2022. yet another attack on cleve overnight the third within roughly just 24 hours on tuesday night ukrainian air defenses destroyed 29 of 31 iran-made shahed drones launched at cleve by russia the institute for the Study of War previously says that Russian forces began a new limited air campaign in recent months to degrade Ukrainian counter-offensive capabilities but the Russian prioritization of targeting Kyiv is likely further limiting the campaign's ability to meaningfully constrain potential Ukrainian counter-offensive actions. President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said on Monday the timing of Ukraine's long-anticipated counter-offensive has been set. Quote, the decisions have been made, he said, without providing further details. After the attack on Kyiv, drones hit several buildings in Moscow, causing minor damage and no serious injuries, the mayor of the Russian capital said early on Tuesday. Moscow is located around 500 kilometres away from Ukraine's border and has only rarely been targeted by drone attacks since the start of the Russian full-scale invasion, even though such attacks have been more common elsewhere in Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Previously, there have been reports of drones being shot down in Kursk and Belgorod regions of Russia, which both border Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In April, a drone came down in the town of Kiv about 400 kilometers from the Ukrainian border injuring at least three people in an explosion after it was brought down. Russian state media said an oil refinery at the Krasnodar region of Russia about 200 kilometers from the Crimean border was targeted by drones on the 4th and the 5th of May, according to Russian media reports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A suspected drone attack injured over 10 Russian soldiers at a military training ground in the Voronezh region. Now, Russia's Ministry of Defense has claimed that Ukraine is responsible for what it straightaway called a terrorist attack using drones against Moscow on Tuesday morning. Ukraine has denied direct involvement with an alleged drone attack on the Russian capital. L'Ukraine a dénigré l'involvement direct avec un drone qui a attaqué la capitale russe.

L'invasion de l'Ukraine par la Russie contribue à mettre en péril les fondements des démocraties, inflation galopante, perturbations énergétiques sans précédent et crises alimentaires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: La création récente en Pologne d'une commission spéciale d'enquête sur l'influence russe, capable de condamner des responsables politiques sans le contrôle d'un juge, suscite une inquiétude particulière.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Car les décisions de cette commission spéciale polonaise pourraient bloquer des candidats de l'opposition. La Commission a été promulguée lundi par le président polonais Andrzej Duda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Elle a été qualifiée d'inconstitutionnelle par l'opposition et certains experts juridiques alors que le pays se prépare à des élections générales à l'automne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Les membres de la Commission examineront l'influence éventuelle du Kremlin sur les gouvernements polonais depuis 2007, année où le parti de la plateforme civique de Donald Tusk était au pouvoir.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
